title: Red Rose
description: “But, Rose, I've really enjoyed our company. I've never shared these thoughts with any other person. I think I love you.” “Don’t say that!” “I can’t help it. We have been sharing our thoughts and our wishes for the future. I want my future to be with you. I do love you and I think you love me.” “Please don’t. I’m engaged to another man. I’m going to be married. By this time next month I will be married. Please don’t say you love me? I don’t, I can’t love you. Please don’t speak to me again.” I turned and walked to the end of the car and sat down facing away from him. My heart felt like it was breaking.
author: J.C. Hulsey
